name: F4H Super GT in German
description: TG Translator bot F4H Super GT

STALK_ID.description: ID for the account whos tweets u want to translate (get it from http://gettwitterid.com)

TRANSLATE_TO.description: Language u want the tweets to be translated to get lnaguage code from here https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes (USE ISO 639-1 CODES)
